mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, od_status, od_total_price, created_at, cart_id, pro_id, quantity, shipping_fee, unit_price) VALUES (#{userId}, #{odStatus}, #{odTotalPrice}, NOW(), #{cartId}, #{proId}, #{quantity}, #{shippingFee}, #{unitPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT os.order_id AS orderId, p.pro_name AS proName, p.pro_color AS proColor, p.pro_size AS proSize, os.quantity AS quantity, os.od_total_price AS odTotalPrice, os.created_at AS createdAt FROM orders os JOIN product p ON os.pro_id = p.pro_id WHERE os.user_id = #{userId}
